content:
March 25, 2021

In our current society, we use certain labels to identify ourselves in this vast and dynamic world. These labels help us navigate the different contexts active in the current modern society. Moreover, they are now more so propagated on the internet as a tool to brand ourselves with or amongst others, in the diverse online communities. Consequently, this how the ideals of digital citizenship were born. One Terry Hieck highlights the frame of digital citizenship as a reflection of "the "quality" of habits, actions, consumption patterns, that impact the ecology of digital content and communities." Have a read and see which persona you identify with the most!

Nato
